notesShort: This character has strong punishes on parry. Space off block in order to avoid good parry Terry.
Be ready to use Shield art to avoid dying early to one of his numerous confirms off of moves like jab and D-Tilt.
Smash art does no damage and will get eaten by the armor on his GO moves. Beware using it when Terry is grounded.
Edgeguard him by intercepting him after a special move or by forcing a low recovery and hitting the top of his Up-B. Be aware of the spike hitbox of Power Dunk.
You can wall Terry, and you can outrun his burst range options, but you can't do both at the same time outside of Speed.
Respect full hop Power Dunk. It autocancels and can be plus on block. Terry is likely holding a button as soon as he lands.
Mix up SDI vs jab. SDI in falls out of Power Dunk while SDI out falls out of Rising Tackle.
U-Throw U-Air into Rising Tackle is true at low percents. Mix up DI in either direction otherwise.
Terry's throw combos are a DI mix-up. DI out vs U-Throw. DI in vs Dthrow.

fsmash.notes: Precise. Hits at roll distance from ledge.
